We have developed an application for personal computer from which user can perform mouse operations with hand gestures only. The application uses camera to identify gestures.
title: Gesture Controller

summary: An android app which sends SMS containing the URL of location with predefined message when any one go to our app and tap the emergency button to the relatives which they have selected previously. .
title: Stay Alive
